author: Pitachan
text: Had a fantastic experience at Draco Coffee and Eatery! Their coffee is top-notch, rich and smooth. The food menu is also impressive, with delicious options that exceeded my expectations. Cozy atmosphere and great service 🌟👌 Perfect spot for a relaxing meal or coffee break! 😊 #DracoCoffee #Foodie #CoffeeLover

author: Dara Mischella
text: On a day when I wasn’t keen on venturing far from home, I stumbled upon Draco Coffee and Eatery on Jalan Mahendradatta Selatan No.7b in Denpasar. This cozy spot turned out to be the perfect refuge for catching up on emails while enjoying a good cup of coffee and some light snacks .. Draco Coffee and Eatery also features dedicated co-working spaces and a meeting room, making it an ideal spot for both solo work and group meetings. Their operating hours from 8:00 AM to 11:00 PM provide flexibility for various schedules.

author: Danny Kwan
text: Quite decent café in mahendradatta area, they serves complete meals from breakfast to dinner and actually also have wide range of menu from croissant, coffee, tea, western food, Indonesian food, healthy food, light bites and beers. I ordered some of them and it taste good and has quite generous portion. Although the place is less fancy than usual coffee shops, but hey, you can spend time here all day by your laptop while enjoying breakfast, lunch, or dinner, they have it all. Overall it's pretty recommended!

author: Zsolt Zsemba
text: I have lived near Draco a year ago and I am back once more. So hang on a second… This place deserves some good reviews, not because it’s the greatest thing in Bali but because of the staff. They remember me from a year ago, the same staff greeted me with enthusiasm and a smile. That makes this place really great in my books. The food is good, tasty and well presented. The coffee is also good and the place has private rooms for your meeting downstairs and work area upstairs. So go ahead and give it a try. The only thing that can improve are the washrooms. Guys the washrooms need to be a bit cleaner. More @zsoltzsemba
ownerResponse: Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your experience at Draco, and welcome back! We are so happy to hear that you feel welcomed and remembered by our staff; building warm and personal relationships with our guests is our top priority. Your satisfaction with the quality of our food and coffee also makes us happy, as does your appreciation of the private space and work area facilities that we offer.

author: Natasha Saleh
text: Perfect pit stop for coffee and lunch. Owner was so friendly and so passionate about coffee. He has a farm in kintamani Bali where he teaches how to farm, roast coffee. Food was good and prices good too. They were friendly with my dog too :)

author: Andrei Orlov
text: I would like to express my appreciation for this incredibly comfortable place. The staff's friendly personality was a breath of fresh air, and it made me feel welcomed and at home.

author: Wanda Therra Nova
text: Cozy place to have a small lunch and sip of coffee in the afternoon. This place has aircon in the inside and the outside sitting place is for smoking area purpose and they provided fan for outdoor setting. The menu is small but solid mix of indonesian / local and European type of cuisine and beverages. You could have coffee, tea, milk, herb drink, alcohol, mocktail, juice, cocktail, beer and arak (local booze) you could order from the cashier. For the menu they have appetizer, main course and snacks also pastry options. As always i ordered refreshing ice latte coffee (less sugar) (28k) and almond croissant and they were freshly brewed and the croissant is crisp enough and sweet for 20k. Their milkshake (35k) is also good! 4⭐/5 would like to eat again! Their service is nice and helpful enough too and they understand English speaker tourist, so go ahead and visit this eatery!
ownerResponse: Thank you so much for your positive and detailed review! We're thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your time here, from the refreshing iced latte to the flaky and sweet almond croissant. We strive to provide a diverse and high-quality menu, encompassing the best selection of local and European cuisine and beverages. It's great to hear that our service met your expectations and that we were able to make the experience easier for English-speaking tourists. We look forward to welcoming you back in the future for many more delightful culinary experiences. Thank you again for your support! Translated by Google ・ See original (Indonesian)

author: Adfeky Endriyane
text: the food is good, and they have a big portion indeed! the coffee is da best! they’re roastery too! and the price is affordable. the co working space is comfy. they have uno cards and poker card too!

author: Yuangga Rizky Illahi
text: A coffee shop that become a very nice place for work. I do some zoom here and they have a private room in the cafe place for work. Devided by 3 segments, it have outside place for smoking, inside place for non smoking, and private place for work. The food is quite delicious, i order chicken wings and they made with a nice taste. Very nice place
ownerResponse: Thank you so much for taking the time to leave a positive review about your experience at our coffee shop! We are very pleased to know that you enjoy a comfortable working atmosphere, including the availability of private rooms that allow you to hold zoom meetings in peace. Your satisfaction with our space segments, from outdoor smoking areas to private work spaces and non-smoking areas, is very important to us.

author: putu suprimayanti
text: The breakfast and lunch at Draco Coffee and Eatery were delicious. I highly recommend it for working from a cafe, perfect for groups of 2-4 people 🥺😍
ownerResponse: Thank you for taking the time to provide your review of Draco Coffee and Eatery. We are very happy to hear that you enjoyed breakfast and lunch at our place, and found our environment comfortable to work in, especially for groups of 2-4 people. Customer satisfaction is our priority and your reviews help us continue to provide the best experience for every guest. We hope to welcome you back in the future. Don't hesitate to recommend us to your friends and family. Thank you again for your support. 😊 Translated by Google ・ See original (Indonesian)

author: Lynn Foc
text: Pretty good rice bowl cabe garam but it was too salty. Nasi bakar was not tasty at all

author: Stenly
text: Nice coffee, drinks, and food. Staff are friendly, and you have options of indoor with AC or outside.
ownerResponse: Hi.., How are you, sis? Hope you are always healthy. Thank you very much for the great review and rating😊 This December we open earlier, and of course there are interesting promos. Especially 20% discount at 7 - 10.30 am for "All Basic Coffee". Waiting for your return (Draco) Translated by Google ・ See original (Indonesian)

author: Indri Duanty
text: The foods are 11/10!!! Try their chicken burger and spaghetti trust me its worth it and their cocktails aswell😍😍 try everythingg👍🏻👍🏻👍🏻
ownerResponse: Thank you so much for your positive review! We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed our food, especially the chicken burger and spaghetti. It was really nice to hear that you also enjoyed our cocktails. We look forward to welcoming you back to try more of our menu. Feel free to ask our staff for recommendations the next time you visit. Thank you again for your support! 😊👍🏻 Translated by Google ・ See original (Indonesian)

author: Cooper Union
text: the wifi was fast enough to watch youtube, and the staff was nice. those are the only two reasons i would give them two stars, not one.

author: Aleksandra Maksimova
text: Love the place! Good wifi for work, morning discount for coffee and love their chicken teriyaki 👍 Accidentally found it in Denpasar and now coming from time to time. Stuff and the owner Joe are lovely and super friendly ☺️

author: Matthias Stuber
text: Let’s start it this way:
ownerResponse: Good Morning, Mr Matthias Stuber. Thankyou for visiting draco before, We apologize, if there are some things that make you feel uncomfortable. With this review, as the younger generation, we can learn a lot, and be even more better. Thank you.

text: Nice place, fast wifi, good ambience

author: v b
text: I got ice coffee latte with oat milk and it was a good coffee. The staff is nice and friendly, I think it is also a good co working space because I connected to their wifi and the speed is pretty fast.
ownerResponse: Thank you for taking the time to write a positive review. We are very happy to know that you enjoyed our iced latte coffee with oat milk and were satisfied with the friendly service from our staff. We are also happy that you found our place … More

author: Ester Maya
text: Affordable, delicious, yet high-quality food, with a wide menu and a very laid-back atmosphere. It's perfect for hanging out with a crowd.

author: Ella Ella
text: The cafe isn't very spacious, but it's comfortable for coffee and chatting with friends.

author: Novanda Ihza
text: Thank you for providing a meeting room for me. The room has four chairs, electrical outlets, air conditioning, and is soundproof enough to avoid outside noise. I spent 150,000 Rupiah on a voucher for a minimal space. The food is delicious, and the prices are relatively reasonable for a cafe. Dine-in and takeout are available. It's a great place to work on assignments and meet people. There are smoking and non-smoking areas.

author: Surya Indradi
text: One of the cafes that provides coffee, cocktails and some food. For the price, it can be said to be standard in Denpasar city for a cafe. For the taste, it is delicious and quite worth it. The service is very friendly. There is a meeting room too. Parking location on the side of the highway
ownerResponse: Thank you very much for taking the time to leave your review. We are very happy to know that you enjoyed our coffee, cocktails, and food. Indeed, we strive to offer standard prices in Denpasar city while ensuring quality and taste that is satisfying for our customers. We are also proud of our friendly team service and are glad that you found the meeting room we provide useful. Regarding the parking location, we understand your concerns and continue to find the best solution to facilitate access and comfort for our guests. Thank you again for your support. We look forward to welcoming you back on your next visit. Translated by Google ・ See original (Indonesian)

author: Madedirga official
text: Overall I like the atmosphere and concept of Draco, there are outdoor and indoor areas that are comfortable and good for work or relaxing, friendly service, standard food and drink prices, cleanliness needs to be improved, table equipment is good. for the taste of the food is good, the drink is also authentic orange flavor, maybe my suggestion is to add a little sugar because the taste of the drink is a little sour,
ownerResponse: Thank you for taking the time to review Draco. We're delighted to hear that you enjoyed our ambiance and concept, both indoor and outdoor, as well as our friendly service and value for money. We also appreciate your feedback on cleanliness and will take immediate steps to improve. Regarding your suggestion regarding beverage flavors, we will consider adding a sugar option for guests who may prefer sweeter beverages. We look forward to welcoming you back to Draco for another satisfying experience. Thank you again for your review. Translated by Google ・ See original (Indonesian)

author: Anna Nartova
text: The food is good for one meal. The rice with chicken in egg crust was a bit too salty. The smoothie is tasty, but not wow.
ownerResponse: Thank you for your review of our dining experience. We greatly appreciate your feedback.

author: kopi mesin
text: The coffee is delicious, I drank a hot long black and we tried several snacks and pastries, all overall were delicious and recommended and we will definitely come back again if we are in the Denpasar area.

author: Sita Mox
text: Originally just wanted to sit down for a coffee but on a whim saw the menu there was soto, wow outside Nurul.. try the chicken soto.. one of the comfort foods that will be on my list 👍👍👍 drink ordered mojito, so an impressive duet. The room is comfortable and elegant, there is a place outside for those who like to drink. My advice for those who like to lie down after eating, this is a good place!

author: Vatikhil Burhani
text: Recommended coffee shop for relaxing hangouts, friendly service

author: Stevani MT
text: A cozy cafe and coworking space with delicious, affordable food. My favorites are cap cay and coffee latte. The owner and staff are very friendly and helpful. Indoor and outdoor seating. There are now two small air-conditioned rooms for those who want a quieter work environment. The Wi-Fi is fast. Recommended.
ownerResponse: Thank you so much for your positive review! We are so happy to know that you enjoyed your time at our cafe and coworking space, especially the cap cay and coffee latte from our menu. Your satisfaction is our priority, and we pride ourselves on having a friendly and helpful team. We strive to always provide a comfortable atmosphere both in the indoor and outdoor areas, including the addition of 2 small air conditioning rooms to provide a quieter atmosphere for working. Glad to know that our wifi met your needs. Thank you for recommending us, and we look forward to welcoming you back on your next visit! Translated by Google ・ See original (Indonesian)
